name: More Human
description:
The high-tech combat equipment you are wearing can be hacked by the enemy, you must leave it behind to win this war...

A bullet game where you have to overcame a series of tests, but you become weaker over time.

Made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 following the theme "Less is More".

Graphics made by Kenney (CC0 1.0 Universal): https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
